description.en: The period before written records, covering the origins of human civilization.
description.zh: 有文字记录之前的时期，涵盖人类文明的起源

description.en: The rise of early civilizations with written records and organized societies.
description.zh: 有文字记录和组织社会的早期文明兴起时期

description.en: The period between ancient and modern times, characterized by feudalism and religious influence.
description.zh: 古代和现代之间的时期，以封建制度和宗教影响为特征

description.en: The period from the Renaissance to the present day, marked by industrialization and globalization.
description.zh: 从文艺复兴到现代的时期，以工业化和全球化为标志
